Bibliographic References: a1 Apollo, vol. 122, no. 286, Dec. 1985, p. 433, fig. 16. (a) Dionysos with thyrsus and phiale following Pan, holding up large oenocheo in r. hand, situla in l., moving to r. and looking back to l., (b) Bv, with stick in l. hand, + A2r, with stick. (The sticks have now largely disappeared).
